definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: Put some spaghetti into the boiling water and boil it until it is tender.
sentences.chinese: 在开水中放一些细通心面，一直煮到面条变软。

sentences.english: How about codfish with macaroni and cheese for dinner.
sentences.chinese: 晚上吃鳕鱼加奶酪通心面怎么样？

sentences.english: Today we made macaroni necklaces in art class.
sentences.chinese: 今天美劳课，我们做通心面项链。

sentences.english: Aymo had a basin of spaghetti with onions and tinned meat chopped up in it .
sentences.chinese: 爱漠搞来了一盆子通心面，拌着洋葱和切碎的罐头肉。

sentences.english: Let's prepare some pasta for lunch.
sentences.chinese: 我们做点通心面当午餐吧。

sentences.english: 300g(Three hundred grams) of macaroni salad, please.
sentences.chinese: 请给我300克的通心面沙拉。

sentences.english: All right, then. Would you like some pasta? I have some leftover from last nigt.
sentences.chinese: 好吧。那你想吃通心面吗？我还有写昨天吃剩的。

sentences.english: He is the cheese to my macaroni.
sentences.chinese: 他是我义大利通心面上的起司。

definition: pasta (abbr. for 意大利麵|意大利面[Yi4 da4 li4 mian4])/(Tw) yi mein, a variety of Cantonese egg noodle
rice in gravy, typically with meat and vegetables
